name: Tangle
description:
Tangle is a local cooperative multiplayer game, it is meant to be played by two players in which both have to cooperate in order to achieve the goal.

In short is a twist on the classic twister game for touch devices

Your device must support up to 10 touches at once, if your device does not support 10 touches please let me know so i can make a list of such devices.

Thank you for trying my game
